mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.adapter

Class MemoryAdapterStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.adapter.MemoryAdapterStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterStore

    public class MemoryAdapterStore
extends Object
implements AdapterStore
    This is a simple HashMap based in-memory implementation of the AdapterStore and can be useful if it is undesirable to persist and query objects within another storage mechanism such as an Accumulo table.
